meanings.definition: A type of physical exercise involving stretching the legs apart while sitting or standing.
meanings.sent1: During gym class, we practiced sidesplits to improve our flexibility.
meanings.sent2: She could easily do sidesplits because she had been stretching every day.
meanings.sent3: The sidesplits competition at the fitness center was both challenging and fun.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to daily sidesplits had her legs feeling like rubber bands.
meanings.sent5: The sidesplits exercise helped her reach new levels of flexibility.

meanings.definition: A situation in which a group or organization is divided into opposing factions.
meanings.sent1: The sidesplits within the company led to a decrease in productivity.
meanings.sent2: The sidesplits between the two political parties were causing tension in the country.
meanings.sent3: The sidesplits in the book club over the next book choice were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The sidesplits in the family reunion made for an awkward atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The sidesplits in the team were hindering their ability to work together effectively.
